sn1.38:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati maddakucchismim migadaye.
sn1.38:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pado sakalikaya khato hoti.
sn1.38:1.4: Bhusa sudam bhagavato vedana vattanti saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa;
sn1.38:1.5: ta sudam bhagava sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano.
sn1.38:1.6: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappeti pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano.
sn1.38:2.1: Atha kho sattasata satullapakayika devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam maddakucchim obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
sn1.38:2.2: Ekamantam thita kho eka devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:2.4: nagavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:3.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:3.3: sihavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:4.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:4.3: ajaniyavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:5.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:5.3: nisabhavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:6.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:6.3: dhorayhavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:7.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:7.3: dantavata ca samuppanna saririka vedana dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano”ti.
sn1.38:8.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam udanam udanesi:
sn1.38:8.2: “passa samadhim subhavitam cittanca suvimuttam, na cabhinatam na capanatam na ca sasankharaniggayhavaritagatam.
sn1.38:8.3: Yo evarupam purisanagam purisasiham purisaajaniyam purisanisabham purisadhorayham purisadantam atikkamitabbam manneyya kimannatra adassana”ti.
